name: Hot and Tasty Bites
author: CHRIS GRASS
summary: It wouldn't be Super Bowl without these goodies! We have a huge bash every year and these are always expected!
ingredients: 1 pound fresh, ground spicy pork sausage
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large skillet, brown the ground beef and the sausage together
Over low heat, add the cheese and the oregano into the meat in the skillet
When the cheese is melted and all is mixed well, spread the mixture on slices of the party rye
Arrange the pieces on cookie sheets
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 5 to 10 minutes, until just browned
